price: Nijedan grad koji smo Mi prije njih uništili nije u čudo povjerovao, pa zar će ovi vjerovati?
arabic: مَآ ءَامَنَتۡ قَبۡلَهُم مِّن قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهَآۖ أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā āmanat qablahum min qaryatin ahlaknāhā afahum yu'minūna
